trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>..
The control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> object.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "RadioButton".
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RadioButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem>, this method returns a `this` pointer.

If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
A value in the enumeration.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
`true` if the element is selected; otherwise `false`.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The selection container.
